main_screen.terms_and_privacy: By creating a wallet, you agree to Pera Wallet's <0>Terms and Conditions</0> and <1>Privacy Policy</1>

name_account.title: Name your account
name_account.description: Name your account to easily identify it while using the Pera Wallet. These names are stored locally, and can only be seen by you.

import_select_addresses.title: Select addresses to add
import_select_addresses.description: We found that there are {{count}} addresses registered to this wallet

info.title: How we calculate portfolio value
info.body:
The Total Portfolio Value is calculated by adding up the value of all asset values and Algo available in your accounts, excluding Watch Accounts.

Asset values are calculated based on daily values fetched from several ecosystem partners.  Since some asset values are not available, the Total Portfolio Value should be considered an estimation.

security.pin_title: Increase your security with a PIN
security.pin_description: This 6-digit PIN will be required to use the Pera Wallet. We highly recommend creating a PIN to help increase wallet security in the event your phone is stolen.

qrview.error_body: No account has been selected, please select an account first

bottom_sheet.no_account_body: No account has been selected, please select an account first

info.title: Transacting Tips
info.tip_1: Before you finalize your transaction keep in mind a couple of tips
info.tip_2: When sending to an address for the first time, it is useful to send a small test transaction before sending a large amount.
info.tip_3: Ensure you are sending to the correct address.

input.error_body: Please enter an amount greater than {{min}}.

currency.title: Main Currency
currency.description: Select a currency as your main local currency for displaying asset values.

main.remove_message: You are about to delete all data in the wallet, including your stored accounts.  Make sure to have your account passphrases stored elsewhere before confirming.  You will not be able to restore your accounts otherwise.  Are you sure you would like to proceed?

arbitrary_data_view.signature_not_found: An error occurred during the signing process.

arbitrary_data_details.title: {{name}} is asking you to sign some data.
arbitrary_data_details.description: A data signing request is a request to sign arbitrary data. This is a commonly used by services to verify ownership of an account, but it does not incur any fees.

request.accounts_select_one_account_body: Please select at least one account to connect with

settings.empty_body: You don't have any active WalletConnect sessions.
settings.delete_body: Are you sure you want to delete this session?  This will remove your active session and disconnect you from the connected app.
settings.delete_all_body: Are you sure you want to delete all sessions?  This will remove all your active sessions and disconnect you from all connected apps.
settings.version: This session is using WalletConnect V{{version}}
settings.permissions_info_body: WalletConnect is a communications protocol for web3, enabling wallets and dApps to securely connect and interact. With each new version, WalletConnect introduces new ways to handle, sign and/or display transaction requests coming from third party projects.
